name: Barrb
description: On a moonlit night when a Barrb has reached maturity, its elegant neck foliage, formerly chartreuse, blooms into a luscious collar in a fetching shade of magenta. This collar quickly becomes the Barrb's pride and joy, requiring frequent waterings and plenty of sunlight.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 20 hr, Enhanced Time: 15 hr
